Headline: Temporary Southbound #57 Laramie Reroute near Laramie/Madison
ShortDescription: Southbound #57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted near Laramie/Madison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Madison, Cicero, Harrison, Laramie, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Laramie/Madison.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #7 Harrison Reroute near Damen/Polk.
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted near Damen/Polk.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Damen/Polk.

Eastbound buses will operate via Harrison, Western, Jackson, Loomis, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Western buses will operate via Harrison, Loomis, Van Buren, Western, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #51 51st Reroute at 51st/Princeton
ShortDescription: 51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via near 51st/Princeton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 51st, Princeton, 55th, Halsted, 51st, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 51st/Princeton.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Austin. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Austin. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
